welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Irmo, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, friendly community, and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that Irmo has to offer during your stay here. Enjoy your time in our wonderful city!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Metropolitan Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: South Terminal
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Metropolitan Airport, primarily used for regional and low-cost flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport, with no time limit.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Owens Field Airport handles all commercial flights and services.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Owens Field Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
